name: Non-linear-kernelized-regression
body:
This code implements Non Linear Kernelized Regression using a Gaussian Kernel on a dataset. The plot below shows the dataset shape.

![](https://github.com/deerishi/Non-Linear-Kernelized-Regression/blob/master/regression.png?raw=True)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
